data.message: Facebook .... why every time im force to actualize the app it just becomes a mess and nothing work ??

replies.message: Hi Javier. If something's not working on Facebook, please let us know: http://bit.ly/2qkfXHo. -Brittany
Facebook  I didn't already all the notifications part isn't working properly and when I try to post more than one pic at the same time the whole app just freeze and after a while it shutdown

Like all the notifications from days ago come as new (they don't change since days) and all the new ones they come under old notification at the bottom of the section, really annoying try to find out what is new and what was already there ... just a big  mess
Hello I just enjoy the speech!!!

Mark is really good at speaking! Has some wonderful ideas! But it is not helping people giving them false hopes and goals. We live in a fallen world. We can not prevent all illnesses. We can and should help everyone we can, but we can not totally do away with poverty in this world. Thank God the next one has no illness or poverty!
Motivational
Thank you Facebook 😊😊😊
Why every 10 days after want update facebook
In billions of user you got the reply within 2 mins Javier Mazuelos .. did you realized the greatness ?
Facebook the entirety of the app.. nothing was wrong :(
It's your phone... I had the same problems... Till I got a new phone
Just use a browser...
Or aap
Why u keep buying everyti ng
Buy a good phone with bigger RAM
Hi Facebook! I am enjoying the speech, it's very inspiring thank you so much for the wonderful ideas.
Thanks Facebook....
